description.full: “Haruka Amami, seventeen years old! We want to become the Ultimate Idol.” The game place you in the role of a producer and the aim is to produce the “Ultimate Idol Group.” Teamwork between members of the group and building secret bond with the leader is especially important. As a producer, gain fans through successful performances and promotions to level your idol up in ranks. Spring 2010, brand new 765 Productions in action.
